mapManagement

Class RandomMapManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapManagement.RandomMapManager

  • public class RandomMapManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class generates random wall objects and arranges positions of them.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomMapManager()
      The constructor creates ArrayLists to hold wall blocks that will be painted to top and bottom of the screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomMapManager

        public RandomMapManager()
        The constructor creates ArrayLists to hold wall blocks that will be painted to top and bottom of the screen. It arranges the positions of these ArrayLists.

        public void updateWalls(java.lang.String path)
